etymology.description: 全(all/whole) + 素(vegetarian/plain) + 食(food) = entirely plant-based food/diet.
etymology.interpretation: Emphasizes a diet consisting solely of plant-based foods, excluding all animal-derived products such as meat, dairy, and eggs. Common in menu labels and dietary/lifestyle descriptions.

examples.chinese: 我选择全素食来保护动物和环境(我選擇全素食來保護動物和環境)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xuǎnzé quánsùshí lái bǎohù dòngwù hé huánjìng.
examples.english: I choose a vegan diet to protect animals and the environment.

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅提供全素食菜单(這家餐廳提供全素食菜單)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng tígōng quánsùshí càidān.
examples.english: This restaurant offers a vegan menu.

examples.chinese: 医生建议我尝试全素食以控制胆固醇(醫生建議我嘗試全素食以控制膽固醇)。
examples.pinyin: Yīshēng jiànyì wǒ chángshì quánsùshí yǐ kòngzhì dǎn gù chún.
examples.english: The doctor suggested I try a vegan diet to control cholesterol.
